title: For Sale/Trade:  FA91 in .308  G3 HK91 clone
postcontent: This is a Federal Arms FA91 in .308 Winchester. These rifles were built using surplus G3 parts kits on US made cast aluminum receivers by federal arms. Shoots well, cycles well. The receiver is made from cast aluminum, with a textured black paint finish. The receiver has a built in weaver rail on top so that you may mount your choice of optics. Front pin sight was removed for optics without interference or spacer, currently has a Bushnell trophy scope 6-18 x 50 mounted. Has a utg triple picatinny tri rail installed. The receiver shows signs of wear and use, from handling and firing.  The barrel has a permanantly affixed muzzle brake. These rifles occasionally had issues with receiver to trunnion play where pinned, and happened soon or not at all, this one has not experienced that problem and is solid. Comes with 2 twenty rd mags and a five rd mag, as well as a utg bipod. Looking for 650 cash or possibly trade for AR,AK,1911 lg cal revolver, who knows?

The Vortex Optics Viper HD 8x42 Binoculars are part of an award-winning series of hunting binoculars. Rugged, compact and lightweight, the Vortex 8x42 Viper HD Binocular is one of the lightest full-size binos available. Combined with a 5-foot close focus range, the compact size makes them great for all kinds of nature observation. The rugged Vortex 8x42 Viper HD Binoculars bring you stunning views, and they're packed with features that make them an excellent choice for any outdoor activity.


Specifications for Vortex VPR-4208-HD ViperHD 8x Roof Binoculars:

Magnification: 8x

Features of Vortex 42mm Binoculars - Viper HD Series:
•HD Lens Elements - HD (High Density) extra-low dispersion glass delivers impressive resolution and color fidelity, resulting in High Definition images.
•XR Lens Coatings - Vortex proprietary XR anti-reflective coatings, fully multi-coated on all air-to-glass lens surfaces, increase light transmission for maximum brightness.

•Twist Eyecups - Twist up and down to precise, intermediate settings to maximize custom fit for comfortable viewing with or without eyeglasses.
•Center Focus Wheel - Adjusts the focus of both binocular barrels at the same time.
•Locking Diopter - Adjusts for differences in a user's eyes. Located on the center focus dial.
•Tripod Adaptable - Compatible with a tripod adapter, allowing use on a tripod or car window mount

title: For Trade:  Polytech M14S IDE trade for another rifle
postcontent:
For trade is a Polytech M14S with IDE side marking and CMP USGI stock. This rifle is a clone of the M-14 rifles that were used in the military. This rifle has a pre-ban flash suppressor with bayonet lug. The IDE versions of this rifle are said to be of better quality and are more sought after. Many say that these rifles with their forged receivers are as close as you could get to a real USGI M-14. 

Although Polytech is a Chinese company, this is not a Norinco rifle - Poly's are build better and have better reviews and are very dependable. Additionally, they are no longer imported to the US. Many M1A/M14 collectors and enthusiasts buy Polytech rifles for their receivers or as alternatives to the more expensive Springfield M1A. 

The only issue of note is that Polytech M14's have some bolts are rumored to be not properly headspaced. However, I have not personally experienced any issues with this particular rifle, so I guess this is not one of them. Also, this rifle does not have a stripper clip guide, but most people do not use them anyway. The only part I swapped out was by adding a USGI recoil spring. 

This rifle is fitted with a USGI M-14 stock that has a Circle P proof mark on the pistol grip, as well as a DAS cartouche on the left side. Overall, the stock is in great condition and shows only average use with no major cracks, dings, etc. Stock also has all original metal work, including the hinged butt plate. An unmarked 20 round magazine and clone M1907 leather sling are also included.

title: For Sale:  S&W 627-3 V8 Comp   Manufactured 2000  SOLD---SOLD----SOLD-----SOLD----SOLD
location: East end of Louisville, Louisville, Kentucky
postcontent:
Smith & Wesson, S&W Model 627-3 V Comp Performance Center .357 Magnum Revolver
Make: Smith & Wesson Performance Center
Model: Model 627 – 3 Performance Center “V8”
Serial Number: KSTO188
Year of Manufacture: 2000
Caliber: .38 Special and .357 Magnum
Action Type: Single Action and Double Action Swing Out Cylinder Revolver

Markings: The left side of the barrel is marked “PERFORMANCE CENTER”. The yoke cut is marked “627-3” and the yoke is marked “215”. The left side of the frame is marked with a S&W Performance Center logo.  The underside of the grip frame is marked “KSTO188”. The right side of the grip frame is marked “24533 215”.  The right side of the barrel is marked “.357 MAG – V8”.

Barrel Length: 5” without removable “V” Comp installed, 5 5/8” with “V” Comp installed

Sights / Optics: This revolver is mounted with an undercut patridge front sight set in a dovetail. There is a square notch S&W micrometer click adjustable rear sight.

Stock Configuration & Condition: The grips are pebbled black rubber finger groove Hogue Mono-grips with Hogue logos. There are no notable scratches, chips or cracks. The grips rate in about Fine overall condition. There is also a smooth Hogue “Miculek” style wooden mono grip provided. 

Type of Finish: Stainless Steel
Finish Originality: All Original

Bore Condition: The bore is bright and the rifling is sharp. There is no erosion. 
Overall Condition: This revolver retains about 99% of its metal finish. There are drag marks on the cylinder. There are no other marks or scratches on the gun or scope  The screw heads are sharp. The markings are clear. Overall, this revolver rates in about Fine to Excellent condition. 

The scope is a weaver 2.5 X 8 variable.  It is very clear in the lower magnifications which is normally all that are used.  

Mechanics: The action functions correctly both single and double action. There is a Performance Center installed trigger stop and tuned action. The double action trigger pull is particularly smooth and light, measuring just over 6 lbs. The cylinder is factory relieved for 8 shot full moon clips (provided), and also will function correctly without their use. The Performance Center “V” Comp is removable by means of a hex wrench (provided). The top strap is factory drilled and tapped to mount optics, once the rear sight is removed. 

Box, Paperwork & Accessories: There is a second grip provided, in addition to the mounted rubber Hogue mono-grip. It is a smooth Hogue “Miculek” style wooden mono as described above.  The white outline square notch S&W micrometer rear sight is included but not mounted due to scope mounting.

S&W calls for a break in period of 500 rounds.  This one has 250 shot so far.

Lock Stock and Barrell sold one just like this for $2150.  This is documented at:       http://www.lsbauctions.com/901/smith-wesson-sw-model-627-3-v-comp-performance-center-357-magnum-revolver/

All offers considered!!!!

title: For Sale:  Berretta 96A1 w/ Ammo
postcontent:
Beretta 96A1: Ultimate Tactical Firepower

The 96A1 is an evolution of the legendary 92FS (M9), one of the world’s most successful pistols for military, law-enforcement and self-defense use.

Chambered in the powerful .40 S&W, it comes with three 12-round magazines to deliver impressive firepower for any tactical use. It is safe, accurate and reliable while offering easy operation, accessorization and disassembly; and its durability is further enhanced by a recoil buffer that greatly diminishes component stress. A pistol that bears the unmistakeable Beretta looks, it is the ultimate choice for shooters wanting a professional-grade personal- or home-defense pistol that can also be easily adapted for concealed carry

Accurate and Reliable

The cold-hammer forged barrel on the 96A1 is designed to deliver great accuracy out of the box, while the dovetail-mounted front sight is easy to adjust to always keep you on target. The barrel is encased in an open slide typical of Beretta’s 90-series pistols; besides reducing weight and backward-momentum during firing, this design maximizes reliability and virtually eliminates “stove-piping.”

Durable and Made to Last

With the 96A1, the hard-hitting .40 S&W comes back stronger than ever in the 90-series lineup. We have worked in conjunction with law-enforcement experts to make this pistol shrug off tens of thousands of full-power rounds with Beretta-style durability. The brand new recoil buffer that is machined right into the action of the 96A1 essentially acts as a cushon against the stress between moving parts, greatly boosting the service life of this powerful pistol. Also, the Bruniton finish on the metal is designed to be corrosion resistant to give worry-free maintenance even after all-day concealed carry in scorching-hot conditions.

Easy to Accessorize

The 96A1 comes with an integral Picatinny rail on which users can easily mount a variety of tactical accessories--such as tactical lights, aiming devices or even both. Additionally, the front sight is dovetail-mounted, meaning that it is adjustable for windage and can be easily replaced with an accessory front sight of the user’s choice. If you love the unmatched performance of the Beretta 92FS or M9 and want a few extra tactical features as well as the extra power of the .40 S&W, the Beretta 96A1 is your ultimate choice.

title: For Sale:  Walther CCP 9mm Semi-Auto Pistol, 3.54 Inch Barrel, Black Finish, 8-Round, Walther 5080300
postcontent:
We have hundreds of other guns currently IN STOCK, and offer some of Utah’s lowest prices! For a complete listing of our current inventory, and to purchase this and other guns online, please be sure to VISIT US ON THE WEB AT:   ***** TooeleShootingSupply.com *****  
Featuring a new SoftCoil™delayed gas blow back technology, Walther Arms, Inc. has introduced its latest concealed carry firearm -the CCP.This semi-automatic pistol comes chambered in 9mm and is the ultimate concealed carry weapon.
Weighing only 22 ounces,the CCP’s SoftCoir™ delayed gas blow back system uses gas pressures from the ignited cartridge and feeds them through a small port in the barrel (in front of the chamber) to slow down and delay the rearward motion of the slide. This is accomplished by means of a piston contained inside of a cylinder located under the barrel that opposes the rearward motion of the slide until the gas pressure has declined-after the bullet has left the barrel­ hence allowing the slide to end its rearward motion,opening the breech and ejecting the empty cartridge case. Two other benefits to this system as a result of SoftCoil™technology are that the slide is easily racked and because barrel rise is reduced, the shooter can acquire targets faster. Tests show that the barrel rise is a third less than similar models on the market allowing shooters to be more accurate on follow-up shots.
With an overall length of just 6.5 inches,Walther’s CCP is a sleek solution to concealed carry protection. The new model’s barrel length is 3.54 inches and its width only 1.18 inches making it easily carried in a purse or inside-the-pant holster. The CCP comes in stylish stainless or traditional black and provides all the features that have become signature of Walther’s line of pistols – smooth 5.5 pound trigger pull,interchangeable front sight;adjustable rear sight; and reversible magazine release for left or right handed operation.
This new single-stack semi-automatic has a magazine capacity of 8 rounds. For maximum safety,the CCP comes equipped with a slim manual safety and one internally that acts as a firing pin block. As with all Walther firearms, the CCP has an ergonomic grip with a unique non-slip Hi-Grip™surface. Other key attributes of the gun include an easy access slide stop;loaded chamber indicator for added safety; and front, rear and trigger guard serrations for additional safety and control of its easily manipulated slide.
   We have 2 in stock, and have them priced to sell quickly for just $409 each. title: For Sale:  1,000 Processed 9mm brass, ready to load. The finest!
postcontent:
9mm indoor range brass, They are tumbled clean, sized and de-capped with a Dillon carbide die, stainless steel pin tumbled to give ultra shine inside and out including primer pockets.  Hand inspected, counted and primer pocket check to make sure none are crimped. 

Why do all this for 9mm casing?  This will make loading on your progessive much more efficient , having not to worry about 40 s&w, .380 auto or crimped 9mm in your case feeder.  For single stage reloaders you can go straight to priming and belling of the cases.  Saves time and frustration in either case.

Yes, this will cost more than dirty mixed range brass.  This offering is for the reloader that values their time and end results.
$40/thousand  (about 7,000 available.)
Pick up would be in University Place along Bridgeport Way West.
Shipping and paypal available.

Thanks,
Doug

title: For Sale:  NIB Colt Trooper Mk3 .357 Magnum Revolver LIKE PYTHON
location: Apex, Raleigh / Durham / CH, North Carolina
postcontent:
I have a brand new in the box Colt Trooper Mk3 .357 Magnum revolver.  This was made sometime in the 1970's, however I do not know exactly when due to my relative unfamiliarity with Colt serial numbers.  That said it's in perfect condition, it's a 6 inch barrel with Colt's royal blue polished finish, wood grips and the fit and finish typical of vintage Colt revolvers.  These are basically Colt's beefed up duty line of pistols that were meant as a counterpoint to the iconic Python series of pistols.  While the Python was and is a great gun, some say that the lockup and timing can be a bit finicky over extended duty cycles, so Colt beefed up the innards to create the Trooper Mk3 series of pistols.  Action and lockup are of course perfect, never been fired, just a great vintage Colt.  

NO TRADES, price is 1500$ ORO for the pistol, comes in its original box, however I don't have any papers or a sales reciept.  What you see is what you get.  I'm in Apex willing to meet in Raleigh or South Durham.  I'd be happy to ship on your dime provided you're legal to own the pistol.  Local purchase will need to present their CHP or bring a pistol purchase permit and photo ID.

This slim traditional design features hardwood grips and a checkered backstrap, along with Low-Glare Stainless Steel slide, lightweight aluminum frame, a Skeletonized Trigger & Hammer, and Rear Slide Serrations.
Features:-Classic, original 1911 Series 70 design.-Lightweight, anodized aluminum frame.-Polished Titanium feed ramp.-Precision CNC-controlled machining process results in a superior slide-to-frame fit and smooth slide travel.-The stainless steel barrel and bushing are produced from the same bar stock, on the same machine, for improved accuracy.-Positive barrel lock-up allows for superior accuracy out of the box.-Oversized ejection port and extended magazine release enhance competition performance.-Thin hardwood grip panels, checkered backstrap and front strap serrations.-Lightweight, aluminum, skeletonized trigger features an adjustable over-travel stop and provides a very crisp, no creep, light trigger pull with a quick, positive reset.-Skeletonized hammer is lightweight and provides faster cycling.-Dovetailed, high-visibility 3-dot sight system features a Novak® LoMount Carry, windage adjustable rear and standard front sights that combine optimal target acquisition and an ideal carry configuration.-Oversized beavertail grip safety provides positive function and reliability.-Extended thumb safety and slide stop lever for improved, positive manipulation.-Integral plunger tube for slide stop and thumb safety is not staked and will never come loose.-Features a standard recoil guide system and flat mainspring housing.-Visual inspection port allows for visual confirmation of a loaded or empty chamber.-Rear slide serrations allow for positive grip.-Accepts all standard, aftermarket 1911 parts and accessories.-Also Includes: swaged link pin; titanium firing pin; two stainless steel magazines; bushing wrench; soft case.

title: For Sale:  Beware the Colt scammers!!!!
postcontent: There is a Colt Ace listed that is also listed in Vermont,along with a lot of other desirable,collectable Colts.They have been scamming people in VT.And are now placing ads in NH.All of the guns are solo listings by unregistered,private parties.They are all very rare pristine Colts that they know will get people acting stupid.The prices are very good and they will lower them,if you offer less.They will send copies (pdf files) of ffl's,and ask for a copy of yours.They are hijacking the ffl's to send to other people to convince them they are legit.Flag there ads,and under no circumstances send a "deposit" or "payment.Ask for a ftf meeting and they will not agree without the "deposit",by check or money order,and untill "funds clear" (no credit cards accepted for obvious reasons).I really hate scumbag crooks!!!! I didn't get taken but,others probably have.

title: For Sale:  Winchester Model 290 .22LR Semi Auto Rifle
location: Spring Lake Park, Minneapolis / St. Paul, Minnesota
postcontent:
Winchester Model 290 semi auto rifle in excellent condition. 20" barrel is in great shape with excellent factory rifling intact. Wood is solid with no cracks, dings, and has nice factory finish intact. Bluing is very nice as well with very little marring at all. More info on the Winchester Model 290:
"The Winchester 290 is an easily handled little .22 rifle that is fun for all level of shooters.  Receiver readily accepts a scope and it's very short LOP makes this semi auto rifle comfortable for shooters of all sizes"
 
 
 
Quick Winchester Model 290 Facts:
 
First year of Production: 1963
 
Last year of Production: 1976
 
Magazine: Tubular
 
The Winchester Model 290 serial numbers are non-sequential
 
Estimated Current Value: $250-$500
 
Traditionally, this semi-automatic action was chambered in the .22 short caliber, the .22 long caliber or the .22 long rifle caliber and has a tube magazine with a capacity of 16 Long Rifles.
 
The Winchester model 290 is in the 200 series for Winchester rifles and includes the models 250, 270, 255 and 275.  The total production for all of the 200 Series family is over 1.6 million according to Winchester.
 
This rifle came in 2 types: The standard and the deluxe.  The Winchester 290 Deluxe was the same as the standard except has a fancy walnut Monte Carlo stock, factory sling swivels and some enhanced carving.  In certain cases, the deluxe was embellished with basket weave and oak leaf checkering and a gold trigger and safety button
 
All Winchester 290s were produced with a 20.5 inch barrel, a fixed front sight, adjustable rear sight and a rail for scope mounting.
The Original Lincoln Pawn & Jewelry of Spring Lake Park
8480 Central Ave NE
Spring Lake Park, MN 55432
www.LincolnPawnShop.com
